body.name: DGG K60 61 Keys RGB Backlit 60% Wired Gaming Keyboard, Ergonomic Waterproof Mini Compact 60 Percent Mechanical Feeling Keyboard, for PC Mac PS4 Xbox Gamer, Typist, Travel
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Monday, February 19 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Thursday, February 15. Order within 14 hrs 13 mins
features: 60% Compact Minimalism Layout: The 60 percent keyboard has a perfect size and it's good for Home、Office、Business or Travel use.You know,keyboard without numpad is most FPS gamers’ choice, more spaces left for mouse movements.

Membrane But Mechanical Feeling keyboard: The bottom of the 61 response key cap is of silicone structure, and the key cap is sprayed with oil radium carving, which makes it feel skin-like and more comfortable.Using advanced imitation mechanical technology, one of the attractive features is the mechanical feeling.

Ergonomic Designed: Key layout of the engineering assembly line.It adapts to the movement arc og the keyboard,and feels comfortables.Thus,the mini gaming keyboard key height is designed according to ergonomics,and it is not easy to fatigue after long-term use.

RGB Backlit lighting Effect: There are 5 kinds of backlight effects, including normal light/wave/horse riding/breathing mode for choice, and 5 levels of brightness and speed for control. It also provides transparent and transparent backlight as well as letters.

High Quality and Reliable Performance:Plug and play, direct use.Compatible with Windows 10, Windows 8, Windows 7, Windows XP, Windows VISTA, Mac OS, etc. The DGG small keyboard can be also suitbale for playing XBOX/PS/SWITCH, a compatible converter DGG adapter is recommended.Within one month, any problem,you can return or exchange for free.

【Kindly Reminder】1.This is a membrane keyboard but mechanical feel. 2.It's small, honest and simple,Please judge the size before placing an order. 3.The W、A、S、D character position is the player's preferred Direction Arrow position, but remember to press FN+W to switch back and forth.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 31, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Really happy with this keyboard
reviews.reviewText: This keyboard is a great value for the price. I previously ordered a 60% mechanical keyboard from Amazon, which I had to return because it was SO loud. Like, "I'm worried about disturbing people in the next room over" loud. This keyboard is not silent by any means, but is much quieter, similar to the noise level of a standard keyboard. The keys are still satisfying to press despite that. The enter key and spacebar are a little "clickier" than the others.The RGB looks really nice. The default setting cycles through the colors pretty quickly, and you can adjust the speed up or down depending on preference. You can also turn RGB off or change it to monochrome.The only downside to me is the positioning of some keys is a little awkward, although I imagine some of it is just adjustment to the different layout of the 60% size keyboard. The enter key is not easily reached with the pinky and I tend to hit the forward slash key when going for the quotations key. The spacebar is at a small downward slant and took some getting used to, but now feels normal. Also, when I received the keyboard the right shift key didn't work, but I took it off and put it back on (easy to do) and now it works perfectly.Overall I'm really happy with this keyboard and I would 100% recommend it for the price.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 3, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Inhad to return for a second one because the input was or got bent.
reviews.reviewText: My son loves this keyboard. he did research and I got it for him for xmas. It doesnt take up much space on his smaller sized desk as it doesnt have the numbers to the right. the lights are cool and he can change them.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 13, 2024
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. I had this keyboard for almost 4 years now, but the letters had faded after a week, if I click F6, the keyboard ceases to work. I like this keyboard, but ever since I started clicking F6 and other buttons, it’s just been turning off and I have to unplug it two times.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars works as advertised

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 5, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Has issues with thespacebar
reviews.reviewText: (I am writing this review with this keyboard and not editing the results in order to showcase the problem)This would be a very solid keyboard forthe price, however, the one Ireceived has an issue where the spacebar needsto be hitwith far more force than the other keys. This results in a lot of words ending up running together or in some cases, it seems hitting itwith a bit too much force resultsin it putting two spaces between words. This is obviously a pain while typing, but that can beedited - what *can't* be edited is the obvious problem this causes when trying to use itto jump in video games.I don't have any experience with mechanical keyboards, so I don't know how itcompares, butapart from the spacebar it doesn't feel that much different from a membrane keyboard. That said, I certainly appreciate how chunky the keys are (it's especially nice to have anISO Enterkey!), and I was surprised by just how much nicer it felt to use keys with ergonomically shaped keycaps.The LEDs are not consistentlybright, with most of the number keys being dimmer than the letters. It also seems as though the emitter under the keycaps is shaped kind of like a puzzle piece, and with several keys you can see thenotches where there's no light, resulting in a kind of splotchy look. There's an "instruction manual" (one small piece of paper) included that tells you what you can use the Function key combos todo. Onesideis in Chinese, andtheEnglish on the other side is mostly fine, but it refersto something that was translated as "streamer". As far asI can tell, this refers to any light setting where the colors change or move inany way. There doesn't appear tobe a wayto make the rainbow mode stationary. I'm not particularly bothered by any of this, butif theLEDs are important for you, then I'd probably knock another staroffthe review.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great budget keyboard
reviews.reviewText: Very compact and exactly what I needed. It’s quieter than most keyboards but still has satisfying noise if that’s your thing. The colors on the keyboard have a lot of options as well. Overall great keyboard!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 23, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful keyword that doesn't work
reviews.reviewText: The first keyboard navigation arrow did not work. Had problems with the V key. it will type extra characters or extra spaces. I requested a replacement and the second one was even worse. The function key did not work at all. Couldn't type the letters V, N, or M. A beautiful keyboard that doesn't work.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 30, 2023
reviews.reviewText: The first one that they sent was not the right one but they really went out of their way to send me a second one as fast as possible and when I got it it works so well.
